Genre: Animation
Running Time: 00:15:00
Year of Production: 2010

Synopsis: Constantinople, 1910. Too many stray dogs in the city streets. The newly established government, influenced by the model of Western society, tries to find out from European experts how to get rid of them before deciding, alone, to deport thirty thousand dogs to a deserted island off the coast of the city. Through the dual point of view of a bitch that has just given birth, and the policeman who's caged her, we follow the forced exile of these dogs, most of which will die of hunger and thirst.
